dmca.title: Copyright
dmca.body:
[private]
Editor
[private]Report.com
C/o Front Desk, National Press Club
[private]
Washington, DC [private]

August 22, 2007

[private]
Senior Vice President, Corporate Development and Chief Legal Officer
Google, Inc.
[private]
Mountain View, CA [private]

Dear Mr. [private],
I would respectfully ask Google to permanently remove a copy of an article that was  obtained from my website: www.waynemadsenreport.com and posted on an anonymous blog operated under the auspices of Google.com

The copy of the article is located at http://milfuegos.blogspot.com/2006/11/litvinenko-murder-grows-murkier-with.html>.  I base this request on my ownership of the article's copyright and the infringement of that copyright by the anonymous operator of the blog milfuegos.blogspot.com.

I thank you for your assistance in this matter.

Sincerely,
[private]
Editor
[private]Report.com

cc:[private], Esq.
[private]Washington, DC [private]
